markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Moonlit Chain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=156)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 558 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=146) [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_ has a collar adorned with stitched images of the phases of the moon. You can see in moonlight as though you had [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416).

<document level="2" id="action-110" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include 33 gp of silver.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Moonlit Chain
